name: Moonlight Stalker Feint

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Moonlight Stalker, Bluff 6 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.

sections.body: Once per round, against an opponent from whom you have concealment, you can spend a swift action to make a Bluff check to feint.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You strike through the shadows so quickly that your opponent can barely react to your attacks.
